item.title: About
item.description: Delta A. Sharp is a: Lab / Computer Technician Programmer Artist Mad Scientist These are a collection of my thoughts. I hope you find them useful, but please take everything I say with a grain of salt. My intention is to help myself learn through the act of explaination. I don’t claim to be an expert in anything~
